episode1.title: My Lucky Charm
episode1.description: Everyone needs a little luck sometimes, except for maybe Goblins who need no one

episode2.title: Jump Right In!
episode2.description: Life is about choices, so make one and see what happens next!

episode3.title: Dream with Me
episode3.description: What dreams can be made when two are united in destiny?

episode4.title: Daphne
episode4.description: The intoxicating Daphne flower calls to both pollinators and humans alike

episode5.title: Falling
episode5.description: When they make your heart go ah-ah-ah-ah

episode7.title: History Lessons
episode7.description: In memory of a precious friend, a jewel that couldn’t be outshown

episode8.title: Life in the Shire
episode8.description: When home is a haven, there’s no limit to what can be done

episode9.title: Feed the Crows
episode9.description: Living in and Loving Nature can be a great balm for your pain

episode10.title: Keep On
episode10.description: There are 3 or 4 little words that I enjoy hearing everyday…

episode11.title: Back to the Shire (Encore)
episode11.description: There’s a place where people practice paradise

episode1.title: Goblin King
episode1.description: You've been punched in the head So many times that you don’t know Which is way is left or right

episode2.title: Psychopath
episode2.description: Everyday I see what’s yours and I think about taking it all away

episode3.title: Countdown
episode3.description: There’s a countdown to living There’s a countdown to the end

episode4.title: A Misery of Goblins
episode4.description: Hey everybody look what I’ve found: Misery is our Dream

episode5.title: Slow Time
episode5.description: And every moment that you give into the greed your soul will drift away

episode6.title: Won't See it Coming
episode6.description: The Goblins don't comprehend science because they aren't able to learn, and won't see the threat right in front of them.

episode7.title: Say Goodbye to the Shire
episode7.description: You can’t coexist with Goblins when they rule the Shire

episode1.title: Ice Fortress
episode1.description: When you’re here you’ll be protected under our care

episode3.title: Rebuild The Shire
episode3.description: Keep the shire dream alive while in the far, frozen north.

episode4.title: Sneak Attack
episode4.description: The goblins enjoy spreading terror by sending raiding parties up to the far, frozen North to harass and spy on the Shire Folk.

episode5.title: Frozen Peace
episode5.description: Here we are, on this frozen shore, very far from our dear home

episode6.title: We’re Coming For You
episode6.description: We can't rebuild the Shire Dream while Goblins still rule the land. We must take back our home.

episode7.title: Prepare for Battle
episode7.description: It’s time to face the Goblin King and retake the Shire

episode1.title: Locked And Loaded
episode1.description: Nothing will stop us now from reclaiming our Shire.

episode2.title: The King has Fled
episode2.description: The Goblin King fled the Shire before the battle again and took captives.

episode3.title: Goblin's Rule
episode3.description: The only rule for you is that Goblins gonna Rule all over you

episode4.title: Ice Blue Greed
episode4.description: There’s no way that the King can resist the trap set by Lucky

episode5.title: The Shire Fortress
episode5.description: Do you want to live under the rule of the hateful and Cruel?

episode6.title: Battle of the Shire
episode6.description: Shoot for the king; stopping his lies are the key to everything

episode7.title: Song of Mourning
episode7.description: There’s a time for mourning, when we’ll share stories at night about our loved ones passing, and how we hold those memories tight.

episode8.title: The Shire Dream
episode8.description: I choose to live free and find the shire dream in me.
